Stem: Yellowish white or pale green, rigid and ribbed.
Flowers: Yellow, 10-20 mm diameter, with outer leaf-like bracts, often bent downwards, cobwebby, spiny.
FruitSeeds: 5-6 mm long, smooth, naked, light brown, with pappus (parachuting hairs) of many linear scales 7-10 mm long.
DistinguishingFeatures: Combination of yellow flowers and leaf lobes ending in spines.
